content.1: And after this it came to pass, that David smote the Philistines, and subdued them: and David took Metheg-ammah out of the hand of the Philistines.
content.2: And he smote Moab, and measured them with a line, casting them down to the ground; even with two lines measured he to put to death, and with one full line to keep alive. And
content.3: David smote also Hadadezer, the son of Rehob, king of Zobah, as he went to recover his border at the river Euphrates.
content.4: And David took from him a thousand
content.5: And when the Syrians of Damascus came to succour Hadadezer king of Zobah, David slew of the Syrians two and twenty thousand men.
content.6: Then David put garrisons in Syria of Damascus: and the Syrians became servants to David,
content.7: And David took the shields of gold that were on the servants of Hadadezer, and brought them to Jerusalem.
content.8: And from Betah, and from Berothai, cities of Hadadezer, king David took exceeding much brass.
content.9: When Toi king of Hamath heard that David had smitten all the host of Hadadezer,
content.10: Then Toi sent Joram his son unto king David, to salute him, and to bless him, because he had fought against Hadadezer, and smitten him: for Hadadezer had wars with Toi. And

content.12: Of Syria, and of Moab, and of the children of Ammon, and of the Philistines, and of Amalek, and of the spoil of Hadadezer, son of Rehob, king of Zobah.

content.15: And David reigned over all Israel; and David executed judgment and justice unto all his people.
